info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 8:25PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Showers with gusty winds will impact portions of northwestern Madison and northwestern Beaverhead Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 823 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers with gusty winds 19 miles southwest of Dillon, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Sheridan, Virginia City, Twin Bridges, Alder, Jackson, Grant, Melrose, Bannack, Laurin, Glen, Beaverhead Rock State Park, Polaris, Clark Canyon and Bannack State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
